scripts.start:
node dist/index.js || echo "

Build the project first [ npm run build ]"
scripts.convert:mp4: command -v ffmpeg && ffmpeg -r 240 -width 512 -height 512 -i out/%d.svg -c:v libx264 -r 60 out.mp4 -y || echo "You need FFMPEG for this action"

bin.lottie-converter:
node dist/index.js || echo "

Build the project first [ npm run build ]"
